short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flockta Assistant enables users to start prospect tracking via linkedin in one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Think of us as 'BDR in a BoxÂ®

Flockta is AI-powered platform that automates sales prospecting research, and crafts personalized messages.

Flockta Assistant improves it even further by providing a varied set of features that fits into your day-to-day workflow by integrating directly into linkedin.

Key Features:
- Add leads and prospects to Flockta directly from LinkedIn in one click.
- Accelerate audition of generated content by visually highlighting relevant prospect information directly on websites that Flockta refers to as a source.
- Browse saved items such as actionable events, quotes and news.
